alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:00PM MDT until August 05 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 259 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles north of Limon, moving east at 35 mph. Another storm 12 miles north of Genoa was weakening. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Lincoln County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
